message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above $850000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to accept $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think the product is worth more to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. This is the best price I can offer at this time.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I think $900000 is the maximum I can go. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to accept $900000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $975000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to negotiate further.
